sub_text.en:
HM Revenue & Customs (HMRC) require a Quarantine Release Certificate (QRC), issued following completion of inspection formalities, to secure the release of plant-health controlled consignments into free circulation.

The QRC can be printed from the PEACH system and faxed to HMRC.

question.en: Which of the following applies to your goods?
question.cy: Pa un o'r canlynol sy'n berthnasol i'ch nwyddau?
